name: Wii BRSAR Audio Archive
summary: Learn about .BRSAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A BRSAR file is a sound archive used by select Nintendo Wii games such as Super Smash Bros. Brawl and Mario Kart Wii. It contains multiple audio files, such as .WAV, .MP3 files, .BRSEQ files, or .BRSTM files, used for sound effects, music, and Wii audio streams.

instructions: You can open BRSAR files with BrawlBox in Windows. The program can be used to extract the contents of the BRSAR files.
